name: Veil
description: Veil aims to integrate best-in-class anonymity technologies to provide uncompromising, always-on privacy. The project describes itself as an open source and privacy-enabled cryptocurrency that can be used for everyday transactions. VEIL was a PoW project launched with no ICO and premine. It claims to be the first cryptocurrency to combine both RingCT, Bulletproofs, and Zerocoin protocol technology for anonymity.
